summary: The Financial Audit Manual (FAM) presents a methodology for performing financial statement audits of federal entities in accordance with professional standards. It is a tool for enhancing accountability over taxpayer-provided resources. This June 2024 revision replaces Financial Audit Manual, Volume 1 (May 2023 version) and contains the audit methodology. The FAM also consists of: Volume 2: detailed implementation guidance Volume 3: the Federal Financial Reporting...
title: Financial Audit Manual: Volume 1, June 2024
